snippet: The State House voted to ban abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy with no exceptions for rape or incest, sending the proposal to a State Senate.
abstract: State House in Arkansas votes to ban abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy with no exceptions for rape or incest.
lead_paragraph: The State House voted to ban abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy with no exceptions for rape or incest, sending the proposal to a State Senate.

headline.seo: Arkansas House Votes To Ban Abortions After 20 Weeks
